TestCase.name: testNestedReusableSubPlan[true]
TestCase.Resource: Calc(select=[yb, avg_b, sum_b, sum_b0 AS psum, sum_b1 AS nsum, avg_b0 AS avg_b2]) +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[AND(=(yb, b), =(rn, w0$o0))], join=[yb, sum_b, avg_b, rn, sum_b0, avg_b0, b, sum_b1, w0$o0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right]) :- Calc(select=[yb, sum_b, avg_b, rn, sum_b0, avg_b0]) : +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[AND(=(yb, yb0), =(rn, rn0))], join=[yb, sum_b, avg_b, rn, yb0, sum_b0, avg_b0, rn0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[left]) : :- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : : +- Calc(select=[b AS yb, sum_b, /(CAST(CASE(>(w0$o0, 0), CAST(w0$o1), null)), w0$o0) AS avg_b, w1$o0 AS rn], where=[AND(>(sum_b, 0), >(/(CAST(CASE(>(w0$o0, 0), CAST(w0$o1), null)), w0$o0), 0))]) : : +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[], window#0=[COUNT(sum_b) AS w0$o0, $SUM0(sum_b) AS w0$o1 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING], window#1=[RANK(*) AS w1$o0 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[b, sum_b, w0$o0, w0$o1, w1$o0], reuse_id=[4]) : : +- Sort(orderBy=[b ASC]) : : +- SortAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, SUM($f1) AS sum_b], reuse_id=[5]) : : +- Sort(orderBy=[b ASC]) : : +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) : : +- Calc(select=[b0 AS b, b AS $f1]) : : +- NestedLoopJoin(where=[=(a, a0)], join=[a, b, a0, b0], joinType=[InnerJoin], build=[right]) : : :- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[IS NOT NULL(c)]) : : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[x, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) : : +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) : : +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[<(c, 2)]) : : +- TableSourceScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) : +- Exchange(distribution=[any], exchange_mode=[BATCH]) : +- Calc(select=[b AS yb, sum_b, /(CAST(CASE(>(w0$o0, 0), CAST(w0$o1), null)), w0$o0) AS avg_b, w1$o0 AS rn]) : +- Reused(reference_id=[4]) +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[b ASC], window#0=[RANK(*) AS w0$o0 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[b, sum_b, w0$o0]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Reused(reference_id=[5])

w1$o0 AS rn], where=[AND(>(sum_b, 0), >(/(CAST(CASE(>(w0$o0, 0), CAST(w0$o1), null)), w0$o0), 0))]) : : +- OverAggregate(partitionBy=[b], orderBy=[], window#0=[COUNT(sum_b) AS w0$o0, $SUM0(sum_b) AS w0$o1 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING], window#1=[RANK(*) AS w1$o0 RANG BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW], select=[b, sum_b, w0$o0, w0$o1, w1$o0]) : : +- [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- Exchange(distribution=[broadcast]) +- Calc(select=[a, b], where=[<(c, 2)]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[y, source: [selectedFields=[a, b, c]]]],
